definitions.definition: The act of giving an illegal payment (a bribe ) to a person in an official position as a means of influencing their decisions.
The activity of offering , giving , or accepting such bribes .

main_definition: The act of giving an illegal payment (a bribe ) to a person in an official position as a means of influencing their decisions.
secondary_definitions: ( law ) The activity of offering , giving , or accepting such bribes .
